title: Zendaya, Mindy Kaling and more stars glam up for Elle Women in Hollywood red carpet
text:
Issa Rae, Zendaya, Lena Waithe and Mindy Kaling on the ELLE 2019 Women in Hollywood event. Collage by Phelokazi Maude. Credit: Getty Images

Zendaya, Charlize Theron, Nicole Kidman, Natalie Portman among stars wearing plenty of black and more at the Elle Women in Hollywood event.

Honoured at the ELLE's 2019 Women in Hollywood include some of the world's biggest stars are Dolly Parton, Lena Waite, Zendaya, Mindy Kaling, Jodie Turner-Smith,Melinda Matsoukas, Nicole Kidman, Natalie Portman, Gwyneth Paltrow and Scarlett Johansson.

Watch the video below for the red carpet looks:





Compiled by Phelokazi Mbude
